name: TinyFilterPanel

blank.description: Set the filter background to transparent
blank.description_zh: 将过滤器背景设置为透明

placement.description: For the position of the drop-down panel, please refer to the same property of the popover component
placement.description_zh: 下拉面板位置，可选值请参考popover组件的同属性

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether or not to add the drop-down panel to the body element
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 下拉面板是否添加到body元素中

popper-class.description: The class of the drop-down panel

tip.description: Tooltip to the right of the title

events.name: visible-change
events.description: The drop-down panel shows hidden events
events.description_zh: 下拉面板显示隐藏事件

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Ways to hide the drop-down panel

description: 用于列表数据过滤、图标卡片过滤等。
description_zh: 用于列表数据过滤、图标卡片过滤等。
